Value:

        { \
                case KviKvsVariantData::Array: delete m_pData->m_u.pArray; break; \

        }

#define DETACH_CONTENTS
Value:
if(m_pData) \
        { \
                if(m_pData->m_uRefs <= 1) \
                { \
                        DELETE_VARIANT_CONTENTS \
                        delete m_pData; \
                } else { \
                        m_pData->m_uRefs--; \
                } \
        }

#define RENEW_VARIANT_DATA
Value:

        { \
                if(m_pData->m_uRefs > 1) \
                { \
                        m_pData->m_uRefs--; \
